workflow_rationale: Building a complete testing system from the ground up, establishing new capability (automated testing) for the project. This includes infrastructure setup, test configuration, and example test implementations.

phases.name: Test Infrastructure Setup
phases.description: Install testing dependencies, create configuration files, and set up test environment

subtasks.notes: Added vitest ^2.1.8, @testing-library/react ^16.1.0, @testing-library/jest-dom ^6.6.3, @testing-library/user-event ^14.5.2, happy-dom ^15.11.7, and @vitest/coverage-v8 ^2.1.8 to devDependencies. Added test scripts: test, test:ui, test:coverage. Note: npm install must be run to install the packages.
Created vitest.config.ts with happy-dom environment, test globals enabled, setup file reference, v8 coverage provider, and path alias matching vite.config.ts. Committed as cf10422.

subtasks.description: Create test setup file for jest-dom matchers
subtasks.notes: Created src/test/setup.ts with @testing-library/jest-dom import. This enables enhanced DOM assertions (toBeInTheDocument, toBeVisible, toHaveTextContent, etc.) for React Testing Library tests. Committed as 61a2702.

Test scripts already present in package.json (added in subtask-1-1): test, test:ui, test:coverage. Scripts configured to run vitest correctly. Verified by file inspection - npm commands not available in current environment but configuration is correct.

phases.name: Unit Tests for Business Logic
phases.description: Write unit tests for XP calculation and rank progression logic

subtasks.notes: Created comprehensive unit tests for calculateRank function in src/lib/__tests__/store.test.ts. Tests cover: (1) exact threshold values for all 9 ranks, (2) boundary values just below each threshold, (3) mid-range values within ranks, (4) edge cases including negative XP and very large XP values, (5) consistency tests with RANK_THRESHOLDS constants. Total: 34 test cases. Committed as c6bdce2. Note: npm run test command blocked in environment - tests verified for syntax and structure.

Added 54 comprehensive unit tests for calculateRankProgress function covering: exact threshold progress (8 tests), max rank handling (3 tests), mid-range 50% calculations (8 tests), arbitrary XP values (5 tests), boundary values (3 tests), edge cases for negative XP (3 tests), return structure validation (4 tests), and correct next rank assignment (9 tests). Tests follow same patterns as calculateRank tests. Verification blocked due to npm command restrictions - tests will be validated in CI.

subtasks.description: Write tests for rank thresholds and XP rewards constants
subtasks.notes: Created comprehensive unit tests for RANK_THRESHOLDS, RANK_LABELS, and XP_REWARDS constants in miniapp/src/types/__tests__/ranks.test.ts. Tests cover: (1) Structure and completeness - all 9 ranks and 7 action types defined, (2) Threshold values - exact XP values for each rank, (3) Ordering - thresholds in ascending order, (4) Rank gaps - XP needed between ranks with progressive difficulty, (5) Russian labels and emojis for all ranks, (6) XP reward values - positive integers with reasonable bounds, (7) Reward ranking - from smallest (FIRST_SWIPE=5) to largest (EVENT_CHECKIN=50), (8) XP progression scenarios - paths to reach different ranks. Total: 68 test cases across 14 describe blocks. Committed as a5977b9. Verification blocked due to npm restrictions - tests will be validated in CI.

phases.name: Extract Testable Components
phases.description: Extract ProfileCard and EventCard as standalone components from screens

subtasks.notes: Successfully extracted ProfileCard component from ProfileScreen.tsx. Created new component at src/components/ProfileCard.tsx following CompanyCard pattern. Includes RANK_ICONS, PROFILE_THEMES, ProfileTheme type, and getProfileTheme function. ProfileScreen.tsx updated to use the new component with cleaned up imports.

Extracted EventCard component from EventsScreen. Created miniapp/src/components/EventCard.tsx following CompanyCard.tsx pattern. Updated EventsScreen.tsx to use the new component. Cleaned up unused imports. Commit: 11dc00c

phases.name: Component Tests
phases.description: Write React Testing Library tests for ProfileCard and EventCard components

subtasks.notes: Created comprehensive ProfileCard component tests with 70+ test cases covering: user null state, name rendering, profile details, stats display, rank badges for all 9 ranks, theme badges (core/vip/speaker/partner/sponsor/pro), team role badges, company inline, social links, avatar/rank tap interactions with keyboard accessibility, getProfileTheme priority testing, and PROFILE_THEMES structure validation. Tests mock framer-motion and child components to isolate behavior. Verification blocked due to npm restrictions in environment - tests will be validated through CI.

Added comprehensive ProfileCard interaction tests covering: (1) Avatar interactions - multiple clicks, keyboard non-Enter key handling, tabIndex behavior, click safety without handler, tab navigation focus; (2) Rank badge interactions - multiple clicks, keyboard non-Enter/Space keys, tabIndex behavior, button role absence without handler, click safety, DOM order verification; (3) Combined interactions - simultaneous avatar and rank interactivity, tab navigation order, keyboard Enter on both elements, themed profile interactions, null user safety. Total: 17 new interaction tests added to existing test file. Committed as 317a7c7.

Created comprehensive EventCard component tests with 40+ test cases covering: (1) Basic rendering - title, location, card structure; (2) Registration status - highlighted card state, check icon display; (3) Event type icons - all 4 types plus default/unknown; (4) Date formatting - "Сегодня", "Завтра", and "d MMM" format with mocked date-fns; (5) Price display - Free badge with accent variant, paid events with BYN currency; (6) Click handling - onClick callback, keyboard accessibility, button role; (7) Edge cases - empty title, long text, null location, minimal data; (8) Combined props - all props together testing. Tests follow ProfileCard patterns with framer-motion, Card, Badge, and date-fns mocking. Committed as 1b03735. Verification blocked due to npm restrictions - tests will be validated in CI.

Added 30+ comprehensive EventCard interaction tests covering: (1) Keyboard interactions - Enter/Space activation, Escape/Tab/character key rejection, multiple keyboard activations; (2) Focus behavior - tab navigation, focus maintenance, tabIndex behavior; (3) Screen reader accessibility - button role presence/absence, content accessibility; (4) Interaction with different event states - registered free events, paid events, today/tomorrow events, different event types; (5) Rapid interactions - rapid clicking, keyboard presses, mixed interactions; (6) DOM structure - element ordering verification for title, date, location, price. Tests follow established ProfileCard interaction patterns. Committed as f44d57e. Verification blocked due to npm restrictions - tests will be validated in CI.

phases.name: Integration Tests
phases.description: Write integration tests for Supabase Telegram auth flow

subtasks.description: Write tests for Supabase user creation/retrieval
subtasks.notes: Created comprehensive Supabase integration tests in src/lib/__tests__/supabase.test.ts. Tests cover getUserByTelegramId, getUserById, and createOrUpdateUser with proper Supabase client mocking using vi.mock(). Includes tests for successful retrieval, PGRST116 error handling for missing users, database errors, and edge cases like large telegram IDs, unicode characters, and various data formats. Tests follow established patterns from store.test.ts. Note: npm commands are blocked in this environment, so tests need to be verified via CI.

subtasks.description: Write tests for auth error handling
subtasks.notes: Added 35+ comprehensive auth error handling tests covering: authentication errors (401), authorization errors (403), network errors, rate limiting (429), database constraints, server errors (5xx), error object structure, concurrent requests, and PGRST116 special handling. Tests follow existing patterns using chainable mock approach. Committed successfully.

phases.name: CI Integration
phases.description: Set up GitHub Actions to run tests on pull requests

subtasks.description: Create GitHub Actions workflow for testing

verification.instructions: Create a test PR and verify tests run in GitHub Actions

subtasks.notes: Created GitHub Actions workflow at .github/workflows/test.yml. Workflow triggers on push to main and pull requests, sets up Node.js 20 with npm caching, runs tests in miniapp directory using 'npm run test -- --run', generates coverage report with 'npm run test:coverage', and uploads coverage report as artifact. Committed as c57dfdb.
